title: Another question
content: Till what time after college hours (3.30 I suppose) you can stay at PES RR campus ?

comments.body: OP is asking how long can someone stay in campus, not when classes end
lmao just wanted to use all the sports facilities at PESU

That I know
But I thought he’s wrong for telling college ends at 3:30

Since I’ll be joining this year I have no idea about till when we can stay. Hence I didn’t reply to that
